channel.title: 99 Fishing
channel.description:
Im almost 12mil exp.
What should I do till 99 (I don't care about profit)

item.title: 99 Fishing
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:14, topic:395614”][quote author=Rash link=topic=492808.msg3603803#msg3603803 date=1305881980]

Woo, I’m getting 99 smithing today

STOP TRYNA STAEL MY THREAD ORITE!?!

Ite , I got it though, you jelly bro.
My brother got 99 fishing last week actually, he did monkfish from like level 90, made pretty big money from that too.

Ima just powerfish it at barb village.

50k xp/h
[/quote]
Not bad not bad, would shilo village be better, do the number of people affect what you catch?

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=492808.msg3603802#msg3603802 date=1305881631]

Woo, I’m getting 99 smithing today

STOP TRYNA STAEL MY THREAD ORITE!?!

Ite , I got it though, you jelly bro.
My brother got 99 fishing last week actually, he did monkfish from like level 90, made pretty big money from that too.
[/quote]How did you train smithing? Profit/loss per xp? XP/hr?

Um, smelted gold till 90, then sorta done half and half addy plates/gold smelting till 99.
Cost me around 30m in total.

Addy plates = avg. 130k p/hour
Smelting gold (with gauntlets) = avg. 58k p/hour

Not sure on loss per exp though.[/quote]

Not sure.

Im dropping, so bank doesn’t matter.

Read full topic

@davidi2 wrote:

Too slow for my taste

50k xp/h[/quote]
Not bad not bad, would shilo village be better, do the number of people affect what you catch?

STOP TRYNA STAEL MY THREAD ORITE!?!

My brother got 99 fishing last week actually, he did monkfish from like level 90, made pretty big money from that too.
[/quote]How did you train smithing? Profit/loss per xp? XP/hr?[/quote]
Um, smelted gold till 90, then sorta done half and half addy plates/gold smelting till 99.
Cost me around 30m in total.

Addy plates = avg. 130k p/hour
Smelting gold (with gauntlets) = avg. 58k p/hour

Not sure on loss per exp though.

item.title: 99 Fishing
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Tuna and swordfish. I did that pretty much from 70-99; the best exp in my opinion, and you’ll make a slight bit of cash on the side, although it’s not as much as it used to be since all the fish prices have crashed.
